```{r data, include=FALSE}
install.packages("jsonlite", repos="https://cran.rstudio.com/")
library("jsonlite")

json_file <- 'https://datahub.io/sports-data/english-premier-league/datapackage.json'
json_data <- fromJSON(paste(readLines(json_file), collapse=""))

# get list of all resources:
print(json_data$resources$name)

# print all tabular data(if exists any)
for(i in 1:length(json_data$resources$datahub$type)){
  if(json_data$resources$datahub$type[i]=='derived/csv'){
    path_to_file = json_data$resources$path[i]
    print(path_to_file["https://pkgstore.datahub.io/sports-data/english-premier-league/season-1819_csv/data/916634f7ec37dd45c86159bc723eb340/season-1819_csv.csv"])
    data <- read.csv(url(path_to_file))
    print(data)
  }
}

```
```{r data}
clean_data <- data %>% select(Div:HTR)
print(clean_data)
```
